work.summary: Spent a summer at IMES working on a project to adapt language models for single-cell RNA sequencing data. Trained on >30M unique cell profiles using up to 6x A100 machines through huggingface accelerate and vast.ai.

work.summary: Worked on the Camera Culture group's Project SONAR to develop a cross-platform framework for decentralized training of machine learning models through data-secure aggregation (FedAvg, FedProx, etc.).
